          <title>
            <string language="en">Direction of thermal energy transfer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung der thermischen Energieübertragung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Direction de transfert d'énergie thermique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sentido de transferência de energia térmica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Senso del trasferimento di energia termico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατεύθυνση της θερμικής ενεργειακής μεταφοράς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dirección de la transferencia de energía termal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration of an arrow shows the direction of thermal energy transfer from hot to cold places or from higher to lower temperatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">high temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">low temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung eines Pfeiles zeigt die Richtung 
der thermischen Energieübertragung von heißem auf kalte Plätze oder
von stark auf niedrigere Temperaturen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration d'une flèche montre la 
direction du transfert d'énergie thermique à partir de chaud aux 
endroits froids ou à partir de plus haut à de plus basses 
températures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração de uma seta mostra o sentido de 
transferência de energia térmica de quente aos lugares frios ou de 
mais altamente a umas temperaturas mais baixas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione di una freccia mostra il 
senso del trasferimento di energia termico da caldo nei posti freddi o
da più su nelle temperature più insufficienti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση ενός βέλους εμφανίζει την 
κατεύθυνση της θερμικής ενεργειακής μεταφοράς από καυτές σε 
κρύες θέσεις ή από υψηλότερες σε χαμηλότερες θερμοκρασίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración de una flecha muestra la 
dirección de la transferencia de energía termal de caliente a los 
lugares fríos o de más arriba a temperaturas más bajas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hochtemperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heiß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">niedrige Temperatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">transfert thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">à hautes températures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">basse température</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">de alta temperatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">a temperatura elevata</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">caldo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">temperatura insufficiente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μεταφορά θερμότητας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υψηλή θερμοκρασία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
